content.rendered:
Directed by Nitin Kakkar

Written by Sharib Hashmi. Sharib Hashmi

Cast Jackky Bhagnani (Jai). Kritika Kamra (Avni Gandhi). Prateik Babbar (Vikram (as Prateik)). Perlene Bhersaina (Richa). Rishi Panchal (Purab). Neha Reddy (Bijal) . Maya Ben (Jay’s Dadi). Panna Bhen (Avni’s dadi). Cricknowle (Jacky). Chetan Daiya (Tiku – Servant). Kumkum Das (Avni’s mother). Bhumika Dube (Sharvanti (as Bhumika Dubey)). Pratik Gandhi (Raunak). Mohan Kapur (Richa’s Father (as Mohan Kapoor)). Aakash Maheriya (Taaxi Driver). Shivam Parekh (Deepu). Sawkar Siddhanth (Chef Varun (Siddhanth Sawkar)). Suneel Sinha (Avni’s Father). Neeraj Sood (Jai’s Father).Bimal Trivedi. Brinda Trivedi (Avni’s aunt (as Brinda Nayak)). Chhaya Vora (Jay’s Mother). Torrell Vinson (Dancer (uncredited))

Language Hindi

Producers Vineet Batra. Chandresh Bhatt. Deesha Dhanuka. Shoaib Ibrahim. Hetvi Karia. Vikram Malhotra

Production Abundantia Entertainment
